content:
That sounds like a great read! Coming-of-age stories can be so relatable and engaging, and the road trip setting adds an extra layer of adventure and excitement. It's awesome that you're enjoying it so far!

Finishing a book can be bittersweet, but it's always exciting to start a new one and discover new characters, stories, and themes. I'm glad I could help you with some recommendations for your next read.

If you don't mind me asking, what is it about the coming-of-age genre that resonates with you? Is it the relatable characters, the themes of self-discovery, or something else entirely?

Also, have you considered exploring other genres or topics in your reading list? Sometimes, venturing out of our comfort zones can lead to new favorite books and authors!
